AI Description: Regtools is a command-line tool and Python library for manipulating sequence alignments (SAM/BAM/CRAM), variant call files (VCF/BCF) and genomic annotations in the standard genomic file formats. It provides various utilities for filtering, sorting, comparing, and annotating genomic data to assist in the analysis of high-throughput sequencing data.
Core Features: Manipulation Of Sequence Alignments & Variant Call Files, Filtering, Sorting, & Comparing Genomic Data, Annotating Genomic Annotations, Command-Line Tool & Python Library
General Tags: Sequence Alignment, Variant Calling, Genomic Data, High-Throughput Sequencing
